text: Joshua N. Goldberg (May 30, 1925 â€“ October 7, 2020) was an American physicist and educator. He was known for his research on general relativity. Goldberg was elected a Fellow of the American Physical Society in 1972. Goldberg died in Syracuse, New York on October 7, 2020 at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American physicists Category:Academics from New York (state) Category:Scientists from New York (state) Category:People from Rochester, New York
